item.title: lti. New go project
item.description:
New Go project: lti

IMS is developing Learning Tools Interoperability (LTI) to allow remote tools and content to be integrated into a Learning Management System (LMS).

Just working on game server that needs to connect to an LMS service, and started developing this go lib.

https://github.com/jordic/lbi
